plot: Every boy needs a father. Meet Frank. Lover, father, fuckwit. A high flying sex addict, told that he is dying, tries to connect with his teenage son by teaching him how to get the girl he likes.
title: Down Dog
plot_es: Every boy needs a father. Meet Frank. Lover, father, fuckwit. A high flying sex addict, told that he is dying, tries to connect with his teenage son by teaching him how to get the girl he likes.
